name: WARPLANETS PLANET BATTLE
description:
Fall OGA Game Jam 2018 Entry ---  Complete The Set

WARPLANETS. PLANET BATTLE. (WORKING TITLE).

War Planets Planet Battle was done in the excellent ( and Free  ) open source Godot 3.0.6

Check out the cutting edge top down space shooter for the holiday season. WAR PLANETS. PLANET BATTLE. WORKING TITLE. Now you can control an entire WAR PLANET and it's fleet of state of the art space craft.

All Sprites excellently done by Open Game Art .org contributors.

Feeling bored with controlling the entire planet? Then hop in your fighter bomber and explore the solar system while you confront other WAR PLANETS. Can you take over the Planetary Control Room and take control of the planet? Do you have what it takes to capture and control all planetary control rooms for every war planet? Complete the set and control them all.

Welcome to the next generation in Top Down Shooters. WARPLANET PLANET BATTLE. WORKING TITLE.

Game development by MAG WEB DESIGNS GAME WORKS

Music by Flint Custom

SEO by FLINT SEO COMPANY
